title: My Desktop Has api-ms stuff ALL OVER IT
body: So there's a LOT of crap on my desktop and it blocks my wallpaper i have in the back. It's all league related and it is mostly "api-ms-win..." stuff, but i don't know how to get rid of it without ruining the client. I tried putting them all into a separate file WITH the league client, but that didn't work. Should i Uninstall and re-install?{{champion:203}}

replies.body: It sounds like you might have installed League onto your desktop instead of the suggested, default file path. At this point it might be a good idea to uninstall, and then when you're installing use the default path of C:\Riot Games\League of Legends.
